metadata.title: The role of rhinoviruses is overestimated in the aetiology of community‐acquired pneumonia in children

body_text.text: There is no doubt that rhinoviruses and other picornaviruses are the real causes of paediatric CAP, but the frequency is probably much less than the levels suggested by noncontrolled observational studies. Therefore, controlled studies are needed, preferably with case–control designs that contain nonsymptomatic, healthy population‐based controls and appropriate analyses.
No conflicts of interest to declare.
